name: SalemCenter
0:
”Alexa, ask Salem Center what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Salem Center what time do they open”
”Alexa, ask Salem Center if there are any jobs available”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: salem center
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Salem Center’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Salem Center. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Salem Center’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Salem Center.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.salemcenter.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
